com.camerontec.catalys.core.marketstate

Interface IMarketMirrorWithOrderArchive

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IConfigurable, IMarketMirror, IRegisterable, IService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FixMarketMirrorWithOrderArchive, SynchronizedFixMarketMirrorWithOrderArchive

    public interface IMarketMirrorWithOrderArchive
extends IMarketMirror
    An IMarketMirror with archive functionality. To reduce memory consumption of the mirror's inactive order data is removed from memory and archived to an "order archive" (usually file based).
    See Also:
    IMarketMirror

    • Method Detail

      • setOrderArchive

        void setOrderArchive(IOrderArchive archive)
        Set the order archive for the mirror.
        Parameters:
        archive - The archive to use, usually file based

      • getOrderArchive

        IOrderArchive getOrderArchive()
        Get the order archive.
        Returns:
        The mirror order archive.

      • setOrderStatusesToArchive

        void setOrderStatusesToArchive(String commaSeparatedList)
        A comma separated list of order statuses (i.e. values for FIX tag 39) that will be interpreted by the mirror as inactive.
        Parameters:
        commaSeparatedList - a string of comma separated statuses, e.g. "2,3,4,8,C"

      • isActiveOrder

        boolean isActiveOrder(ITagValues order)
               throws Exception
        Check whether an order is "active", i.e. whether the order is NOT in a state which has been configured via setOrderStatusesToArchive(String).
        Parameters:
        order - The order to check
        Returns:
        true If the order is active, i.e not yet archived, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        Exception - If an error occurs while checking the status of the order

      • getArchivedOrderIterator

        Iterator<ITagValues> getArchivedOrderIterator()
                                       throws Exception
        Returns iterator of archived orders.
        Returns:
        the iterator.
        Throws:
        Exception - if something goes wrong accessing the archive

      • clearArchive

        void clearArchive()
           throws Exception
        Clear the contents of the archive.
        Throws:
        Exception - if something goes wrong accessing the archive

      • closeArchive

        void closeArchive()
           throws Exception
        Close the archive.
        Throws:
        Exception - if something goes wrong accessing the archive

      • getFillEntry

        ITagValues getFillEntry(String clOrdID,
                        int tag,
                        String value)
        Retrieves the fill for given order and with the given tag/value from archive. Note that this will return the original values of this fill, ignoring any later corrections or cancellations of this fill.

        If more than one exists, any one could be returned.

        Parameters:
        clOrdID - used for order retrieving.
        tag - Tag used for retrieval.
        value - Value of tag used for retrieval.
        Returns:
        null if no such fill.
